articles.title: Sony's legal battle against Tencent's Horizon ‘clone’ is already over
articles.description: In July, Sony sued Tencent to prevent the release of Light of Motiram, a game Sony alleged was a "slavish clone" of its popular Horizon series. But the legal battle is already over; the two companies have reached a "confidential settlement" and the case has been dismissed with prejudice, according to a court document filed […]

articles.title: LG and Dolby partner to release the first FlexConnect soundbar
articles.description: Dolby Atmos FlexConnect technology debuted this year with the TCL Z100 speakers, and now we're getting our first FlexConnect soundbar thanks to LG.
